blocks.content_html:
Navigation

Unreal Engine C++ API Reference > Runtime > Core > Math

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Base
  • TUnrealPlatformMathSSEBase
  • TUnrealPlatformMathSSE4Base
  • FLinuxPlatformMath
  • FMath

References

   
Module Core
Header /Engine/Source/Runtime/Core/Public/Math/UnrealMathUtility.h
Include #include "Math/UnrealMathUtility.h"

Syntax

struct FMath : public FLinuxPlatformMath

Remarks

Structure for all math helper functions, inherits from platform math to pick up platform-specific implementations Check GenericPlatformMath.h for additional math functions

description: Structure for all math helper functions, inherits from platform math to pick up platform-specific implementations Check GenericPlatformMath.h for additional math functions
title: FMath
